#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t,n,*a,i,max,m;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		a=new long long int[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		m=a[i]%9;
		if(m==0&&a[i]!=0)
		a[i]=9;
		else
		a[i]=m;
	    }
		sort(a,a+n);
		max=a[n-1];
		switch(max)
		{
			case 0: printf("red\n"); break;
			case 1: printf("blue\n"); break;
			case 2: printf("pink\n"); break;
			case 3: printf("white\n"); break;
			case 4: printf("black\n"); break;
			case 5: printf("violet\n"); break;
			case 6: printf("cyan\n"); break;
			case 7: printf("yellow\n"); break;
			case 8: printf("green\n"); break;
			case 9: printf("brown\n"); break;
		}
		delete a;
	}
}
